Posts.Content: My doctor told me basically every treatment option available at the time for prostate cancer. Me father and one uncle died from it and another uncle had his prostate removed years ago. I trusted my doctor fully , plus did research on the web. The only problem on line is that some doctors are trying to sell books, find new patients or have some hidden agenda. I used information from only reputable hospitals and cancer agencys.
Posts.Title: How do you make medical decisions?
